dict.acceptation: 密友，好友；同伴，搭档；互相帮助的朋友；[名]巴迪；

sent.orig: Buddy arrived at the animal hospital with singed fur and covered in black soot.
sent.trans: Buddy被送到医院的时候，一些毛已经被烧焦，全身都是黑色的烟灰。

sent.orig: They were glad to find out that they spoke the same language and soon became buddy-buddy.
sent.trans: 他们很高兴地发现双方志趣相投，很快变得亲密无间。

sent.orig: Adolescence─when a lad forsakes his bosom buddy for a bosomed buddy.
sent.trans: 青春时期--少年丢弃玩伴、追求异性的时候。
我感到奇怪的是她们俩那么友好。
我和他是非常要好的朋友。
